[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1598428099028{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1598428142991{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][rev_slider_vc alias=”cyberthum”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1598427610648{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5719″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][g5plus_heading title=”About Cyberthum”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]Cyberthum stands at the cutting edge of technology that drives tomorrow. Part of a 26.8 Acre mixed used development, it is the definition and the benchmark of what tomorrow’s landmarks will be built on.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” full_height=”yes” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1595592756787{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1595592989063{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;padding-left: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://proppertee.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/projects_lt_bg.jpg?id=5640) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][g5plus_heading title=”Project Highlights” color_scheme=”color-light”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

  • North India’s tallest commercial tower
  • 50 level iconic towers
  • One of North India’s largest musical fountain
  • Mall in the sky
  • Leed platinum certified building
  • A helipad and ample parking facilities
  • The office towers are designed as a vertical campus – Distinct zones for distinct workmodes

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1595592289665{background-image: url(https://proppertee.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/projects_rt_bg.jpg?id=5639) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1598339107101{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1595593176451{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][g5plus_heading title=”Amenities” text_align=”text-center”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Offering State-of-the art Infrastructure

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1598428526282{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;border-top-color: rgba(221,221,221,0.49) !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: rgba(221,221,221,0.49) !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”custom_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box layout_style=”layout-left” icon_type=”image” icon_image=”5649″ title=”MULTI-CAR PARKING” description=”2 multi-level parking planned, with 10,000 car park capacity each.”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box layout_style=”layout-left” icon_type=”image” icon_image=”5756″ title=”UTILITY TUNNEL” description=”A tunnel running through the city for routing all utility services. Gives easy access to pipes thus avoiding digging.”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box layout_style=”layout-left” icon_type=”image” icon_image=”5759″ title=”AUTOMATED WASTE COLLECTION SYSTEM” description=”A next generation technology.”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box layout_style=”layout-left” icon_type=”image” icon_image=”5650″ title=”DISTRICT COOLING SYSTEM” description=”Buildings are cooled with chilled water reducing energy cost.”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1598428526282{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;border-top-color: rgba(221,221,221,0.49) !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: rgba(221,221,221,0.49) !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”custom_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box layout_style=”layout-left” icon_type=”image” icon_image=”5736″ title=”FIRE STATION AND EMERGENCY RESPONSE CENTRE” description=”With provision for special facilities.”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box layout_style=”layout-left” icon_type=”image” icon_image=”5737″ title=”POWER ENSURING 99.999% POWER RELIABILITY.”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box layout_style=”layout-left” icon_type=”image” icon_image=”5738″ title=”WORLD-CLASS ROADS”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][g5plus_icon_box layout_style=”layout-left” icon_type=”image” icon_image=”5739″ title=”WATER MANAGEMENT” description=”Zero discharge with storage and utilization of surface run-off and rain water. Drinkable water from tap.”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” full_height=”yes” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1598601809568{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://proppertee.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/feature_bg.jpg?id=5654) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1595593176451{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][g5plus_heading title=”FEATURES” text_align=”text-center” css=”.vc_custom_1595594305247{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”5657″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1598338702780{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1598338881877{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://proppertee.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/projects_lt_bg.jpg?id=5640) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][g5plus_heading title=”Connectivity” color_scheme=”color-light” css=”.vc_custom_1598339058550{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Proppertte Is just 30 minutes away from Upcoming international Airport and is 55 km away from the IGI Airport.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator css=”.vc_custom_1598339248873{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

A straight stretch connecting Noida and Delhi, the project is just few minutes away from many prime locations Central and South delhi.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator css=”.vc_custom_1598339217367{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

2 minutes from Noida sector 137 Metro station and CBT.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator css=”.vc_custom_1598339229083{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Several MNC’s like KPMG, Infosys campus, Samsung,Accenture,TCS in close vicinity.
